note.p: Education: Queen's College, Belfast; Trinity College, Dublin. BA, MA (Dublin)
Career: Assistant to Thomas Andrews (FRS 1849); Demonstrator of Experimental Physics, University of Glasgow (for 29 years); Private assistant to his uncle, Lord Kelvin
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1927 vol 113 pp xii-xiii, plate, signed by A R
